name: BetterTogether
description:
This is a tiny platformer game where you have to control two characters (the blue and the red dude) at the same time. 

You control the red dude with the keyboard arrows. You jump (and double jump) with the up arrow. 

Aaaand, you control the blue dude with the WASD keys, and jump with the W key. 

This game was made for the GMTK game jam, and unfortunately I didn't have time to make the sounds or music, but that's it! I hope you like it
